headline: RIO Stock A Bright Spot In Ailing Market
content: There haven't been many bright spots in the market but RIO stock is standing out this year. Here's how we found it for swing trading.

headline: Dow logs best day in over a year to end volatile week as angst over Russiaâ€™s Ukraine invasion gives way to buying
content: U.S. stock benchmarks close sharply higher Friday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite booking weekly gains, as reports indicate that Russia was in favor of talks with Ukraine.

headline: Defense Stocks In Focus As Russian Troops Close In On Kyiv
content: Defense stocks Lockheed and Northrop rose Friday as the U.S. shuffled key assets in Europe amid Russia's Ukraine invasion.

headline: A Wild Four Days Leaves the Market in Better Shape
content: The market did a nice job of building on the furious reversal that occurred on Thursday, but what was most notable Friday was that strength rotated into the Dow Industrials and other areas of the market that had lagged on Thursday.  Small-caps and growth stocks that jumped big on Thursday were not nearly as robust on Friday.

headline: Dell Stock Tumbles After Computer Maker Misses Earnings Goal
content: Computer hardware giant Dell Technologies Thursday beat Wall Street's sales target but missed on earnings for its fiscal fourth quarter.

headline: Intuit Stock Falls As TurboTax Maker Impacted By Slow Start To Tax Season
content: Financial software firm Intuit late Thursday missed Wall Street's estimates for its fiscal second quarter. Intuit stock fell.

headline: Dow Jones Surges As Putin Tightens Grip On Ukraine; Etsy Explodes; 3 Stocks Make Bullish Moves
content: The Dow Jones rallied as Vladimir Putin tightened his grip on Ukraine. Etsy stock soared on earnings, as did Block. Johnson & Johnson surged.

headline: Cybersecurity Stocks To Buy And Watch Amid Ukraine-Russia Crisis
content: The best cybersecurity stocks to own is changing amid a shift to remote work and cloud security. Now ransomware attacks are impacting budgets.

headline: Dow surges 835 points to log best day in over a year as stock-market investors shake off Russia-Ukraine crisis
content: U.S. stock gauges rally sharply Friday, marking a second straight day of gains that erased losses in the holiday-shortened week, amid the Ukrainian crisis.
